prototype.name: Ghoul
prototype.flavorText: Being dead has its perks, but in this case time and humidity has not been kind - the rotting flesh is literally sapping off the bone on this one.

prototype.name: Poizom
prototype.flavorText: Just like any frat boy, after the Friday night bash - bloated, gassy, puking and generally unpleasant to be around...
